      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      static Vec3d RandomPositionGenerator.findRandomTarget​(EntityCreature entitycreatureIn, int xz, int y)
      finds a random target within par1(x,z) and par2 (y) blocks
      static Vec3d RandomPositionGenerator.findRandomTargetBlockAwayFrom​(EntityCreature entitycreatureIn, int xz, int y, Vec3d targetVec3)
      finds a random target within par1(x,z) and par2 (y) blocks in the reverse direction of the point par3
      static Vec3d RandomPositionGenerator.findRandomTargetBlockTowards​(EntityCreature entitycreatureIn, int xz, int y, Vec3d targetVec3)
      finds a random target within par1(x,z) and par2 (y) blocks in the direction of the point par3
